entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
